app.name: Instaq
history_photo_defect1: No results due to an error.
selection_headline: Which one is your best photo?
selection_popup_title: Let Instaq help you find Instagram's most relevant hashtags for this wonderful photo:
leave_feedback_rating_desc: Improve Instaq hashtags by rating your results.
leave_feedback_good_hashtags_desc: Which hashtags do you like most?
leave_feedback_bad_hashtags_desc: Which hashtags are out of context?
leave_feedback_comments: How can we make it better?
leave_feedback_send_feedback: Send and transfer them to Instagram
diduknow_fact1: Around 95 million photos are uploaded on Instagram every day
diduknow_fact2: 32 % of all Internet users are on Instagram
diduknow_fact3: Posts with at least one hashtag reach an average of 12.6 % more engagements
diduknow_fact5: 38 % of female and 26 % of male internet users use Instagram
diduknow_fact6: 17 % of teens say Instagram is the most important social media site
diduknow_fact7: videos get 2 times the engagement compared to photos
diduknow_fact8: Engagement increases with each hashtag as you go up to 11
diduknow_fact9: Wednesday 5 pm is the best time to post a photo
diduknow_fact10: Posts that include tagging another handle gain 56 % more engagement
diduknow_fact11: Posts with a location receive 79 % more engagement
diduknow_fact12: 1.1 billion people use Instagram, but only 500 million of them use it every day
diduknow_fact13: The top 5 Instagram hashtags are #love, #instagood, #fashion, #photooftheday, and #style
diduknow_fact14: Brands post an average of 27.9x per month, meaning they almost post every day
diduknow_fact15: Posts containing or featuring User-generated content has a 4.5 % higher conversion rate than non-UGC posts.
diduknow_fact16: Images with a single dominant hue have the best results
diduknow_fact17: Images with texture have a 79 % higher engagement rates in likes compared to the ones with low texture
diduknow_fact18: Images with more background space (negative or white space) get 29 % more likes
diduknow_fact19: Images that have blue as the dominant color get 24 % more likes than images with red as the dominant color
diduknow_fact20: 60 % of the top brands use the same filter for every post
diduknow_fact21: Hashtags with 21-24 characters perform better than shorter hashtags because they are more specific
diduknow_fact22: 400 million users watch Instagram Stories on a daily basis
diduknow_fact23: 30 % of users bought a Instaq they discovered on Instagram
feedback_intro: We hope you had a great experience. To build an even better experience, we want to include you in the process of making it by giving us your feedback. What do you like about this app? And what do you dislike about it?
about_desc:
Thank you for using Instaq.

We believe in improving the process of finding Instagram hashtags. To bring the same quality of hashtags used by large influencer agencies to everyone, we built Instaq on a base of big data-sets and powerful algorithms to analyze Instagram's latest, most successful content and want to form the best possible User Experience around it.

Do you agree with our vision? Let us build this dream together! Contribute to Instaq by giving us your feedback for hashtags or ask for features or improvements.
about_credits_1: Dario D. Müller from Germany for Management and Programming
about_credits_2: Tim Wiesenmüller from Germany for Management
about_credits_3: Jabub Jiricka from Czech Republic for Frontend Programming
about_credits_4: Nazar Nastin from Ukraine for UI / UX Design
about_credits_5: Aditia Kurniawan from Indonesia for Logo
about_credits_6: Christan und Paul from Germany for kickstarting this Idea
store_intro: Getting hashtags is like Magic, Get photo uploads with uncensored hashtag results for all of your best photos. All packages include a lifelong unlimited history.
store_outro: Keep in mind that Google takes 30 % off for every transaction you make.
faq_outro: Any improvement ideas? Want to give us feedback or advice? Let us know.
settings_share_subline: Tell your best friends about Instaq
toast_hashtags_hidden: The hashtag is hidden due to Free-Mode :'(
progressbar_home_freemode: Free mode: Some hashtags will be hidden.
progressbar_confirm_promode: photos left: Enjoy the best hashtags.
progressbar_results_freemode1: Free limit reached: Best hashtags are hidden.
progressbar_results_freemode2: Upgrade to Instaq Pro to unlock hashtags.
share:
Hey, I found this app called Instaq. It helps me find the most relevant Instagram hashtags for my photos. Let it help you, too. It's free :)

http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.innocliq.instaq
